attributes.title: Boo

attributes.review: I downloaded this to support my Cheeto king, but my oh my did it hurt my day. 🥺 After I downloaded the app, I woke up after a dream of Barren, and Millania Trump just staring at me, and asking for help. After I did, I realized I had sleep paralysis, and knew I had to next face the paralysis demon. 😗✌️🔫 I have never gotten sleep paralysis before, so I was so scared ;(, but then as I was preparing myself, 𝘪𝘵 appeared. IT WAS TRUMP!! Oh my! I had never been so scared before in my entire life! 😰 He was in the corner, mumbling something but I couldn’t make out exactly what he was saying. Then he came.. closer. I could now here him say “ America “ and then another word but I still didn’t know quite what it was. 🇺🇸🧢 Then he came even closer! I wanted to ~𝘱𝘰𝘰𝘧~ out of existence.. 🌬😭💨 but I could now hear the other word.. “mine!”.. “America mine!” He kept repeating it over.. and over.. and over until he disappeared! AT LAST I WAS FREE!!             I went on with my day like nothing happened until I was eating a fried egg 🍳, and ALL OF A SUDDEN, the yolk BECAME TRUMP!! 🧚‍♂️✨✨ “ 𝘣𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘦𝘯.. 𝘠𝘖𝘜 𝘛𝘈𝘚𝘛𝘠 𝘓𝘐𝘛𝘛𝘓𝘌 𝘉𝘖𝘠, 𝘊𝘖𝘔𝘌 𝘛𝘖 𝘋𝘈𝘋𝘋𝘠!🥴🥴” NOOO BARREN!! 😱😱😱The yolk turned back into yolk after, but I wasn’t the same. 🤢🤮👎👎 Things like this happened all day, while I was brushing my teeth Millania showed up in the mirror 👀, I looked outside to see Barren waving sadly at me 😢😭, Trump was in my glass of juicy agua 💦, Mike Pence was smiling at me in my TV looking like a while CLOWN 🤡🤠, and finally as I go to finally rest my head, the whole Trump community flashes before my eyes.. so many Cheetos.. too many😪😵👩‍🦰👨‍🦰.. the creepy faces 👁👄👁.. saying things.. w-when.. NO ONE ASKED!!!!!!!!!! OH THE HORROR!! 😱😱😱😭😭😭🤧😪      PLEASE I BEG OFF YOU, DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL RUIN. YOUR. LIFE. ✨🐥✨🦋🦋🧚‍♂️✨🧚‍♂️✨👑🦋🧚‍♂️👑👑✨✨🌈
attributes.title: Disappointingly Awful 😔🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.review: AS SOON AS I DOWNLOADED THIS APP I SWEAR TO YOU MY HEART DROPPED ❤️⬇️😿 THE FIRST THING I SEE IS A MESSAGE REMINDING ME THAT I WILL NEVER AMOUNT TO ANYTHING IN MY LIFE BC I AM A MINORITY IN AMERICA 🙄😞 I MEAN IVE BEEN HEARING IT ALL MY LIFE BUT FROM THE PRESIDENT!!!! ALSO NOT A SURPRISE BC HES LITERALLY A RACIST, XENOPHOBIC, HOMOPHOBIC, WHITE SUPREMACIST OLD MAN THAT IS NOT ABLE TO LEAD THIS COUNTRY 😍😍 HAVE A GOOD DAY 😿🤩😳🧚‍♂️✨🌟⭐️
attributes.title: IT CALLED ME UGLY AND POOR!!!!💔
